targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "service_uptime" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "service" = 'bitcoind') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "service"
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "service_uptime" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "service" = 'lnd') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "service"
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "service_uptime" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "service" = 'electrs') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "service"
SELECT last("totalbytesrecv") AS "Recv" FROM "bitcoin_nettotals" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("totalbytessent") AS "Sent" FROM "bitcoin_nettotals" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("size_on_disk") FROM "bitcoin_blockchaininfo" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("num_peers") FROM "ln-info" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "bitcoin-uptime" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter LIMIT 1

SELECT last("uptime") FROM "autogen"."system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter LIMIT 1

panels.title: IP addresses from services and network devices

targets.query: SELECT last("created_at")  / 1000000 FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "systemd_unit"
SELECT "electrs_mempool_vsize"  / __series.field FROM "autogen"."prometheus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "fee_rate"
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "user", mean("usage_system")AS "system" FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "user", mean("usage_system")AS "system" FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") AS "load 1min", mean("load5") AS "load 5min", mean("load15") AS "load 15min" FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host"
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "user", mean("usage_system")AS "system" FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "user", mean("usage_system")AS "system" FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
